message.body: Hi
Hi
Where are tou testing from?
Texting*
Wow my spelling is horrible this morning lol
New jersey, pretty exciting place. You?
Ann Arbor Michigan. Student at U of M. What do you do?
I graduated from UVA last year and now work as an IT consultant. What are you majoring in?
Political science and global health.
Cool. What would you want to do ideally with your degree?
Ideally, become director of WHO. Haha that's been my dream job since I was a little girl. Once I graduate I want to continue with public health, work in
third world countries
Haha what did you do growing up that made you want to chief lady in charge of WHO? I didn't know what that was until a couple years ago
I am sudanese, so I grew up most of my life in my grandparents village in Sudan. I've been through power outages, lack of clean drinking water, droughts,
Sand storms, you name it. And my dream was always to grow up and become a doctor and go back and help. Open free clinics, do what I can to help, which i
s still my dream, only on a larger scale lol
O wow. Yea that makes a lot of sense actually haha :) so have you started applying to medical schools yet?
No. I'm slowly inching towards that, I have been lazy at getting the med school requirements done lol I want to get a masters in public health first, I a
m just starting my senior year in the fall so I am looking at applying to those schools first
What is your degree in?

O that's cool. I majored in systems engineering and computer science. So yes, kinda nerdy but I wanted to make sure I didn't have trouble finding a job.I also like problem solving and working with people so that worked out well
